messages.content: It is an Extension for ComfyUI that intercepts the default browser behavior when pressing `Tab` key, and focuses the `textarea` instead.
What does the comfyui-tab-handler extension do with the `Tab` key?
It blocks the default browser behavior of highlighting browser tabs or favorites and instead makes it switch between `textarea` inputs such as prompts when the `Tab` key is pressed.
Does ComfyUI handle the `Tab` key by default?
No, by default ComfyUI doesn't handle `Tab` key according to the extension documentation.
What is the purpose of the comfyui-tab-handler extension?
The purpose of the extension is to improve the user experience by preventing the undesired behavior of the `Tab` key in the browser when using ComfyUI.
